0.2.0
----------------
  - record/proxy
    - log to file
    - readback file

  - type "Hello World" -> hello world

Future
----------------
  - robust command line

Wishlist
----------------

  - copy to/from clipboard
  - support more encodings
  - strings, tesseract OCR
  - debian package
  - drop twisted dependency

Rejected
----------------
